function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of timeline-based representation in the design process leading to inefficient analysis of design options.","Impact":"Delayed decision-making and difficulty in analyzing the longitudinal results of simulations.","Mitigation":"Incorporate tools and technologies for timeline-based representation in the design process for efficient analysis.","Technologies":"Simulation software with temporal visualization capabilities.","People":"Designers, architects, and decision-makers.","Owner":"Design and simulation software companies."},{"Description":"Difficulty in browsing large contact tracing datasets leading to inefficient data analysis.","Impact":"Inability to identify top risk regions and perform backward analysis, leading to potential oversight of critical data points.","Mitigation":"Implement a hierarchical interface for data browsing with informative data plots highlighting top risk regions.","Technologies":"Data visualization tools with hierarchical browsing capabilities.","People":"Designers, health experts, and data analysts.","Owner":"Design and data analytics software companies."},{"Description":"Lack of quantification of simulated output leading to inability to score design options based on contamination or infection rate.","Impact":"Inability to assess the relative risk of different design options in terms of contamination and infection, leading to suboptimal decision-making.","Mitigation":"Develop algorithms for quantifying simulated output and scoring design options based on contamination and infection rate.","Technologies":"Simulation software with quantification algorithms and scoring mechanisms.","People":"Designers, health experts, and decision-makers.","Owner":"Simulation and algorithm development teams."}]}
